review: good game but definitely got irritated at times with how much backtracking i needed to do also had to check guides at times  almost didnt want to recommend it but it is definitely a good game just a lot of qol missing mapclipboard maybe  not a game to play while high
enjoyable horror game with a very good story can only recommend it

great adventure game with one of the most interesting scifi worlds ive come across dialogue is well written and the voice acting is superb ill be playing stasis to get more of the world  highly recommend

terrifying pointandclick adventure game wrapped around a tragedy with lore thats fascinating to dig through and piece together the game never locks you out of a solution and every time i felt stuck its just because i hadnt looked enough or needed to rattle my smooth brain around until the answer came to me  warning for serious body horror and gore and theres one puzzle that doesnt seem to make sense which i beat my head on until i solved it out of luck
not bad

i picked this game up on a whim and it very pleasantly surprised me the world it builds is fascinating filled with neat and intriguing concepts the story itself is okay its not bad but its not incredibly exceptional the puzzles are fine too albeit almost nonsensical at times requiring some strange logic luckily the devs created a guide that can help you if you get stuck overall definitely work a look at and i hope to see more from the world of stasis
wasnt a huge fan of the puzzles but the art story telling and characters made up for it the voice acting should be highlighted as well as it really brought the characters to life

the atmosphere sound and story of this game are outstanding  i dont particularly enjoy the gameplay itself and i think i would enjoy more challenging puzzles but the story itself is so strong that id play it again just to experience the story  this game has such fantastic storytelling you owe it to yourself to play

the improvements from stasis to statis bone totem are astonishing this is certainly one of my favorite 2d isometric horroradventure games ive played voice acting is excellent and the story narrative pulls you in to the point of emotional attachment i look forward to the next installment of stasis which i hope isnt too far away

a good adventure game dark and brutal with some heartwrenching moments   i can nitpick about some bits but overall it was very satisfying the puzzles are fun the locations are interesting and the worldbuilding is decent the voiceacting is especially good definitely worth playing if you like adventure games and want a macabre horror experience
nice game
great adventure and story loved it
good

awesome adventure  super engaging all the way to the end love all the twists love the amazing and powerful effective writing not to mention the great voice acting this is definitely in the top 5 best point  click adventures ive ever played
good point and click horror game  interesting world building and story
puzzles n massacres
tremendous video game
its definitely not for everyone but for those that like isometric horrorthis could be the game for you the puzzles aresomething to say the least and the horror is definitely interesting
perfect love it
awesome game with a really cool story

i randomly found this game on sale and wow im not dissapointed this is also my first point and click game the story is so intriguing well written and emotional i loved the characters dynamic moses is the best if you enjoyed soma or anything lovecraftian check this out

beautiful visuals nicely done puzzles are a great assets of this adventure game but what drives it forward the best is character interaction and dialogue you get to feel for these people even though the game works with just a few characters all of them are memorable i am a very smart bear now

much more user friendly than stasis 1 and though the story is delightfully unsubtle it does toss some curve balls at you its very fun and the puzzles arent nearly as confusing as stasis 1 in a good way it seems more user friendly but not barney simple
fantastic point and click game atmospheric and good story  surely worth of playing
fantastic point and click engaging puzzles gripping plot and incredible art designvisuals
played both stasis and statis totem definitely a good successor to the original stasis it was a little contrived at points but it had a well designed story and great visuals 810

710 solidly written story with some interesting mechanics borrowed from day of the tentacle of all places most of the puzzles make sense with only a few outliers being overly obscure or difficult starts getting a bit absurd by the last few chapters plus the rather melancholy ending is a bit on the short side
absolutely stunning for a small studio to produce this game is remarkable
great game with a great story i recommend this especially if you like scifi horror games
a very fun experience this was my first isometric point and click game the story and voice acting were really strong and what compelled me to keep playing to see how the story would play out
great story

i really enjoyed this reminds me of old 90s pointclick adventure games but with qol updates look by hovering better inventory three characters so you rarely have just one puzzle to solve the story is nothing new but it is well told  and the overall atmosphere looks fantastic its like cronenberg and hr giger made a lovecraft game
1010 story leaves me wanting for more
its like playing the scooby doo point and click games again from my childhood just a lot more fun and intuitive and with a lot more body horror l  there is lots

very approachable for a point  click rookie like myself with engaging reasonable puzzles and an equally engaging welldelivered story the writing is excellent the music voice acting and visuals are phenomenal the old ai stuff is gone by the way the game looks better than at launch it is a modern scifi story in a dystopian setting that manages to tackle interesting themes with respect to the players sensibility and intelligence fantastic game overall

there are some puzzles in this game that will kick you so hard in the balls that you lose your will to live but the story is great visuals are awesome the creepy as hell body horror stuff is great and it has probably one of my favorite point and click game uis
great story 1010 got me wanting more

a worthy successor to the original stasis much more expansive in scope and you can tell they had a lot more time andor budget to work on this one come for the scifi horror stay for the sentient teddy bear

the production quality is incredible for a relatively small indie game the voice acting is top notch the atmosphere the detail in the environments just really impressive it deserves to find a wider audience  i found the puzzles to be quite hard and had to use the guide a lot

great game and story puzzles are hard had to use walk through on most of them still enjoyable

good point and click puzzle game interesting characters except for charlie

ok this was absolutely not my theme i find weird alien creatures growing in peoples bodies and eating them alive  and slimy parasites disgusting i did not really pay attention to the teaser  but this was a very good game i loved the story the athmosphere and the music the visuals not so much haha recommendation to play this

great

an absolutely wonderful game  for such a small studio i am genuinely impressed with the level of quality the cinematics and environments look excellent the voice acting and characters were wonderful and the story was compelling and interesting  i loved every second of playing this
great game worth the time
this game is a lot of fun filled with mystery exploration and hidden story i recommend you try it as well

id give this a 85 out of 10 the puzzles vary widely in difficulty which is nice but some are a little obtuse i had a few visual bugs and one related to my resolutions size the plot definitely sucks you in and is the star of the show worth it on sale and would probably be worth full price too
really nice atmosphere voice acting interesting plot and some references to the first game are great the same universe but different story
10 out 10 excellent and inventive puzzle structure i liked the voice acting great cinematics curious to see what they come out with next

great squishy visuals and pleasant to ear voice acting will guide you through alien and yet strangely familiar environment with consistently written characters biopunk horror sewn expertly for your enjoyment yet game doesnt dive in complete nihilism   moses is the angel  coplayer disagrees vehemently
a god damn masterpiece

utterly unbelievable experience felt like i was playing the dig indiana jones and the fate of atlantis and myst all at the same time combines themes from the abyss alien and hp lovecraft to perfection took me about 20 hours to finish but i used the walkthroughcheated plenty   looking forward to a prequel that explores more of this story

its a good point and click horror game doesnt have any jump scares and mostly plays with its concepts near the end it kind of lost me mainly because of one character that i just could not get behind overall i would still buy and play this game again if given the chance the puzzles were tight and the mechanic of each character having their own special abilities that interact with objects was a good touch
i really liked it in the beginning but it soon lost me   had its moments but felt dull and repetitive in later stages
great story great characters solid but not frustrating puzzles great visuals great atmosphere
chris bischoff asked to leave a review so i did he makes solid games though i had little time with this one what ive seen is good you should try it
has good story likable characters at times really emotional
great game has a good balance between story and gameplay moments

i hate puzzle games but this is highkey one of my favorite games ive ever played makes sense beautiful environments engaging story deep ass world and lore great characters 100 blows the original stasis out of the water  certified pure gem
amazing story that tugs on the heartstrings the puzzles can be a bit funstrating at times by the end of the game i was kinda ready for it to be over for a bit but the story really is good
one of the best games i have played the story is something else thank you
great plot and characters fun gameplay with no handholding and a good balanced challenge great visuals and solid audio 810

incredible game   the story is full of incredible twists turns and emotion also the cinematic cut scenes are a treat the puzzles and solutions to problems are creative and unique and the game ended with me wanting more of the world it takes place in   be sure to give the game the time and patience a pointandclick adventure deserves the reveal of the story and its characters is well worth the wait   would strongly recommend
ight game

i enjoy this game and its puzzles are not always being straight forward there is a lot of exchanging items between characters to either use combine or break apart there are things to help guide you a bit like a button that allows you to see what you can interact with and hints that exist in the form of flavour text on the items logs and character dialogue outside of the actual hint option you can enable

way to long way too yapping after each new screen immersionbreaking vas with annoying expressions yes we know this place is fked up you dont have to be so amazed each time  first game was way better than this sorry

this dev team keeps refining their formula game after game at this point its a top notch experience  as always however play with a guide open in another tab to reference when you get stuck the ingame hint system is insufficient for some of the more nonsensical or time sensitive combinations
great game with amazing atmosphere and art design very well written and kept me hooked all the way through 910 would recommend

their previous game was not enjoyable for me so im not sure what i expected from this one the gameplay is basically puzzle after puzzle and more puzzles for you to solve which can get repetitive and tedious the games flow and immersion are disrupted by the excessive dialogues and subpar voice acting during the latter portions  im a fan of puzzles and point  click games yet this one doesnt resonate with me
amazing simply amazing
the games ambientation is pretty good and the inventory management is done in a clever way although the ending part is a bit long
great lorepacked story creative gameplay and a very satisfying ending for fans of puzzles and narratives definitely recommend

not sure why people find this to be a great game it is a simple pointclick adventure  handling inventory items is a bit iffy do i have it now or do i need to click the mouse again the constant loud sighing of charlie is the only gripe i have with the voiceacting but it is annoying enough  1 of a million but still a decent game atmosphere is quite unique

this is awesome this game has the sauce great set design wellwritten rounded characters with depth and actual meaningful goals the writing in this is really great and tight theres some weird stuff like uncanny animation in the cutscenes and some silly flavour text the puzzles are very satisfying most of the time and the overall experience was superb one of the best adventure games ever highly highly recommend
excellent game

overall loved it and would recommend to people who are interested in scifi horror thought that the voice actors did a great job and i ended up liking all the characters   only critiques are that i wish that the text scrolled faster during dialogues and that the transition between characters was smoother
very cool story and excellent atmosphere and setting the voice acting really brought the characters to life

910 wonderful experience recommend playing stasis good game and then cayne meh game for the full experience  remember to click everything if youre stuck and try to breakcombine everything you can sometimes a storydialogue event needs to happen to progress further this is rather frustrating when youre switching between three different areas and some of the item combinationsuses arent reasonable

good game
their best game yet like a gory aliens game done in the gritty visual style of disco elysium with amazing character personalities and stories
very cool game so much detail put into it and the story is great no cheap jumpscares just good ol atmosphere

pros the art style the story this is a 90s game in spirit tho personally i dont like how they hide almost the entire story in the reading materials  cons this game plays really bad moving items in and out feels janky for most games itll only take some time to get used to the controls but for this game that jankiness is throughout the entire game you just have to bear with it
an amazing puzzle game with a compelling narrative inviting you into a beautifully developed and fleshed out lovecraftian world 1010

this is a beautiful game with an immersive story and relatable characters it completely draws you in taking you on an incredible adventure the tone is dark and yet magical reminiscent of spielbergs ai the puzzles are challenging and yet very logical utilizing switching between characters to take advantage of their different strengths its definitely not one to miss the story and characters will stay with you for long after your spirit has found the nexus terrific

i need more games like this in my life  everything a great pointandclick should have  great story telling and worldbuilding dialogue and voice acting make it immersive exploration and navigation feel intuitive and engaging puzzles offer subtle hints that draw my focus and logical thinking ive barely gotten started and i can tell this is gonna be a fun and weird ride and i only hope my impatience doesnt ruin this for me

this is one of those very pc games that defines the platform for me interesting puzzles compelling story and so much gorgeous and detailed horror art to explore  it is a game that can only exist on this platform i found the puzzles to be just challenging enough to make me think but not  have to use a guide more than maybe once this is a good game for cozy late nights at your desk
good puzzles

the setting and story was top notch some puzzle solutions can be really dumb but nevertheless great overall

amazing storytelling i really fell in love with the characters moses and faran there relationship is a beautiful narration of being brave in the face of insurmountable fear and danger regarding the puzzles  i am far too dumb to play a puzzle game of this caliber luckily the devs kindly left a detailed walkthrough for u for free even though they also sell the walkthrough though in an illustrated version this is very decent
this game takes a lot of ideas and pulles them off well together
absolutely excellent fantastic storytelling interesting gameplay very good voice acting truly a sign that point n click adventure games will never go out of style

it took me 127 hours to finish this game without help i think that is a good amount of hours of quality content for the price of this game the point and click genre is by no means dead it is just under a new great management
extraordinary

this was my first point and click adventure game and im really glad i played it the main downsides are the animated cut scenes are a pretty janky looking and i found myself stuck on some of the puzzles even with ingame hints in spite of that the setting and art direction are terrifying with well written characters and extremely competent voice acting

a very well done adventure game that was a lot longer than i expected  the story kept me engaged and i just had to find out how it all played out  lots of puzzles and a few obscure moments when i wasnt sure what items to use where but the game offers helpful hints if it detects youre having trouble with certain sections  if you like atmospheric narrative driven game and dont mind it being point and click then this game comes highly recommended
loved it great story
this game brought tears to my eyes
no monster chases stealth sections or timed events just puzzles and puzzles and grotesque eye candy
a very good bear
simply a masterpiece in every way
very good quest good art and text for environments would like to play more of this

its another game set in the stasis universe except now we travel underwater instead of into deep space like the first game its an isometric pointandclick adventure game packed with even more puzzles than the first the characters are wonderful the environments are richly detailed and the atmosphere and sound design are spoton its another game id highly recommend to horror and adventure fans
great fun interesting puzzle mechanics no combat a very nice slow burn played it 100 on steam deck in bed
